eraseConfirm: Erase all saved data? This cannot be undone.
disclaimer: All data stays on this device. This app offers no medical advice.
goals.title: Goals
history.title: History

welcome.title: Welcome to Alchohalt
welcome.description: Your personal, private wellness companion for building healthier drinking habits.

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: All your data stays on your device. We never collect, store, or share your personal information.

tracking.title: Smart Tracking
tracking.description: Log drinks with intentions, HALT triggers, and craving levels to understand your patterns.

insights.title: Personalized Insights
insights.description: Get AI-powered insights about your habits, triggers, and progress over time.

goals.title: Set Your Goals
goals.description: Create personalized goals and track your progress with motivating streak counters.

ready.title: You're All Set!
ready.description: Ready to start your wellness journey? Your first log is just a tap away.

quickTips.title: Quick Tips
quickTips.tip4: Export your data anytime for backup

medicalDisclaimer.title: Important Medical Disclaimer
medicalDisclaimer.content: Alchohalt is a personal tracking tool and does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. This app is not a substitute for professional medical care.
medicalDisclaimer.emergency: If you are experiencing a medical emergency or need immediate help with substance use, please contact emergency services or a healthcare professional immediately.

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Protected
privacy.onDevice: All your data is stored locally on your device using secure, encrypted storage. We never collect, transmit, or store your personal information on external servers.
privacy.dataControl: You have complete control over your data. You can export, import, or delete all information at any time from the Settings panel.

support.title: Support & Feedback
support.description: We're here to help you on your wellness journey. Your feedback helps us improve the app.

subscription.title: Subscription Information
subscription.coreFeatures: Core habit tracking features remain free forever. Premium features enhance your experience with advanced analytics and insights.
subscription.cancellation: Subscriptions can be cancelled anytime through your device's subscription settings. No data is lost when downgrading.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Alchohalt is open source software. You can review our code, contribute improvements, or build your own version.
